items.title: Our story
items.description: In the aftermath of the dissolution of one of the largest networks for women in tech in 2024, the women of our London community decided to continue our mission in a new community: to empower all women in the tech space. United by a common goal and fueled by a shared passion, our tight-knit community joined forces, bringing their experience, diverse talents and perspectives to the table.

items.title: Our mission
items.description: At Women Coding Community we aim to amplify the voices, talents, and opportunities for women in the tech industry. We are committed to breaking barriers, advocating for gender equality, and creating a culture where every woman feels valued, supported, and empowered to thrive in tech.

items.title: Our community
items.description: Diverse, vibrant, and inclusive â€” our community is the heart and soul of Women Coding Community. From seasoned professionals to aspiring newcomers, we welcome women of all backgrounds, experiences, and skill levels. Whether you're seeking mentorship, networking opportunities, or simply a supportive community to belong to, you'll find it here among like-minded peers who share your passion for technology.

items.title: Do you want to volunteer with us?
items.description: Get in touch with our team or join our slack community.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.description: Ready to join the conversation, or have a question for us? We'd love to hear from you!
